nodes.text:
The Nyenthi'Oris Graveyard was a sacred Wookiee burial place in the Kkowir Forest. The graveyard lay
on a small isle in the Chenataa river, next to the Great Tree. It was watched by the Spirit Guide.
This place was implemented by the developers of Rage of the Wookiees, the second expansion of Star Wars Galaxies, as a place in the Kkowir Forest region where killed players could respawn (clone).
